titleStmt.title: The huntsmans delight, or, The forresters pleasure. [...] Tune of, Amongst the leaves so green. / By J.M.
titleStmt.author: Martin, Joseph, ballad writer.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Come all you young [...] & lend an ear ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: trimmed and stained affecting legibility.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
